name: Overview
data: [{"id":"bc96c5f0-c8b5-4eb5-8655-ecee56814016","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Group: Execution Logic & State Management","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e97283d9-2577-453c-bb41-435b96f64c57","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Execution Logic & State Management","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" group contains the components that bridge the gap between the static blueprint of the code and its dynamic behavior. While other modules focus on where code is located, these modules focus on how code behaves—specifically how functions interact, how the engine maintains its own internal \"memory,\" and how it records specific runtime-style errors.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4a42324a-6b96-4e5f-a0c7-d344f6b66dd8","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"aeef9222-e239-4d3f-8d9b-555eb0299aad","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Included Modules","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f9aadd24-74fa-4dec-a6a6-5b8afb0cf83c","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"callgraph.py","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3a7707c8-0fff-40cb-a1ad-0da878c1bd29","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Architectural Map","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This module takes the raw, path-sensitive data from the analysis and flattens it into a high-level representation of function dependencies. It provides the \"big picture\" of the software’s logic, filtering out internal engine artifacts and primitives to show a clean graph of which functions call one another.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"32626b1b-3a90-465a-aa10-44225560613b","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"calls.py","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"61d6672c-e92a-486f-8504-1d71d9cc474e","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Execution Flight Recorder","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This module is responsible for the granular tracking of every function and method invocation. It records call sites, captures the arguments passed, and maintains the exact chronological order of execution. This data serves as the raw input that the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"callgraph","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" later refines.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ab38f23b-c8db-48a3-9a9b-64da0b0da71a","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"gol.py","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c9ece62d-d27e-4620-bead-c793ecaa62e2","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Global Registry Utility","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":". A foundational utility that provides a centralized, dictionary-based storage for the analysis engine itself. It allows disparate parts of the Jarvis system to share state (like counters, configurations, or shared manager instances) without direct coupling between classes.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"60d2ea9d-f512-4098-91e8-8f7d67207da3","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"key_err.py","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"19a69267-7003-4971-b614-800952ec4b71","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Specialized Diagnostic Sink","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This module provides a focused mechanism for collecting potential ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"KeyError","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" vulnerabilities. As the analyzer discovers dictionary lookups that might fail, it logs them here with full file and line-number context for final reporting.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"47879fb3-301d-4dad-bc2b-c3afd21e0599","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"339ea7cc-c2b1-4c00-bd54-076f0746318e","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Group
